Title: Relates to increasing the class for certain vehicular crimes and enacting Kane's law
Summary: Relates to increasing the class for certain vehicular crimes and enacting Kane's law; increases the class of vehicular manslaughter in the first and second degrees, aggravated vehicular homicide, and aggravated unlicensed operation in the first degree.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to increasing the class for certain vehicular crimes and enacting Kane's law
